short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Portal Push | Push your appraisal orders details to CSV, Webhooks or Appraisal Inbox in just one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to efficient appraisal order processing. Portal Push is a free browser plugin that works with a wide range of bank, AMC, and lender order portals, making it a versatile and time saving tool for appraisers. It streamlines the appraisal order process by helping appraisers push their appraisal order details in just one click!

- CSV for usage with any spreadsheet software
- Webhook for building your own custom integrations (Zapier, Make, etc.)
- Directly into Appraisal Inbox (appraisalinbox.com)
